name: DIGI-CMA
description: DIGI-CMA is a ground breaking e-learning platform for students of the Bangalore chapter of ICMAI.  Study Anytime, Anywhere:  With the new DIGI-CMA app, students can study anytime, anywhere on a device of their choice. Time and place are no longer constraints thanks to the easy availability of mobile data.   Cutting edge technology meets the best digital content:  The lectures on the App are shot in dedicated studios exclusively for digital delivery. The post production process uses cutting edge tools and the latest technology to optimize the videos for streaming.   Versatile and Seamless Experience across devices:  Lectures are streamed in Full HD resolution and the quality selector in the App allows students to choose the resolution of their choice to save bandwidth. The App is compatible with both phones and tablets. You can start viewing on one and transition to the other device or a browser seamlessly.
